ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor?
The primary instructor's sensitivity to students and ability to provide students with adequate feedback was:

narratives.question_text: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course:
Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: It is helpful for students exploring their interests, but a little hard to understand some context since it is in a more advance level.

This course gets us started with understanding and exploring the research in related fields, which is important for graduate students. Listening to the lectures and presentations of the speakers from different institutes helps to broaden our sight in scientific research.
This course is very interesting. It not only open our mind, but also provide us many opportunities to further our studies.

The level of this course is beyond our scope. Since there is no instruction, it is hard for us to follow the guest speaker's presentation. It seems that we are the audiences to this course, since we couldn't learn anything from the seminar. The preparation session before the weekly seminar is very inefficient. Since each seminar's materials are really hard to understand, peer's presentation would not be able to give us a proper and accurate background information. Sometimes, since the peers themselves cannot fully understand the materials, their presentations are wrong. Therefore, I suggest that the instructor of this course should present the background information for the seminar.
Help to know the latest development of industry

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Instructor: Joshua L. Warren  Great instructor!
Instructor: Joshua L. Warren  very great

Instructor: Joshua L. Warren  The main part of this course is discussing research papers with fellow students as well as listening to presentations of researchers. Dr. Kane and Dr. Warren's idea that encourages students to read papers, make preparations and introduce them to other students is helpful, and makes us be more familiar with what is going on in related fields of research.
Instructor: Joshua L. Warren  Very good.
Instructor: Joshua L. Warren  Professor Warren did not instruct anything related to this course during this semester.
Instructor: Michael John Kane  Helpful instructor
Instructor: Michael John Kane  great in organizing the seminars

Instructor: Michael John Kane  The main part of this course is discussing research papers with fellow students as well as listening to presentations of researchers. Dr. Kane and Dr. Warren's idea to encourage students to read papers, make preparations and introduce them to other students is helpful, and make us be more familiar with what is going on in related fields of research.
Instructor: Michael John Kane  Professor Kane did not instruct anything related to this course during this semester. I hope in the future, he should at least say something about this course.

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The YSPH will send emails to students, and I suggest you can pick whichever topic that you're interested in to participate since most of the topics, if you do not have experience in that area, you may sometimes have hard time to follow.
This course encourages students to learn more about related research and gets all students involved in this process. The dessert and tea tastes good!
This course is merely a seminar instead of a course. I would not recommend it to another student, since we didn't learn anything from it.
